flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Make your own QR codes to put anywhere or maybe use in business or just for fun.

Have fun!
guide.introduction_rendered:
Make your own QR codes to put anywhere or maybe use in business or just for fun.

Have fun!

Tools
  • pc or mac ,printer optional, qr code reader

lines.text: You may know what to do from here.
lines.text_raw: You may know what to do from here.

lines.text: Choose the data type, website URL, wi-fi login, text doc, YouTube video, Facebook, Twitter, iTunes link, Skype call, email address, or whatever you want to point to.
lines.text_raw: Choose the data type, website URL, wi-fi login, text doc, YouTube video, Facebook, Twitter, iTunes link, Skype call, email address, or whatever you want to point to.

lines.text: Enter the website URL if it is a website URL.
lines.text_raw: Enter the website URL if it is a website URL.

lines.text: And change the color if you want.
lines.text_raw: And change the color if you want.

lines.text: Then select print, download, email, and so on.
lines.text_raw: Then select print, download, email, and so on.

lines.text: Also on the website http://www.qrstuff.com, it tells you all about QR codes: what they are and where to get the readers/scanners.
lines.text_raw: Also on the website http://www.qrstuff.com, it tells you all about QR codes: what they are and where to get the readers/scanners.

guide.summary: Make your own QR codes to print, email, put on T-shirts, or put just about anywhere.
guide.title: Make Your Own QR Codes

tools.text: pc or mac ,printer optional, qr code reader
